title: How to Make Ground Peanut Stew

steps.headline: Sauté onions in olive oil for 10 minutes.
Stir in cayenne pepper & garlic cloves & Sauté for a couple of more minutes.
Cover and sauté for a few more minutes.
Mix in juice, water, salt, ginger, cilantro & tomatoes.
Add okra & simmer for another 5 minutes.
Place the pot on a heat diffuser & simmer gently until ready to serve.

text: Sauté onions in olive oil for 10 minutes.  Stir in cayenne pepper & garlic cloves & Sauté for a couple of more minutes.  Cover and sauté for a few more minutes.  Mix in juice, water, salt, ginger, cilantro & tomatoes.  Cover and simmer for 15 minutes.  Add okra & simmer for another 5 minutes.  Stir in the peanut butter.  Place the pot on a heat diffuser & simmer gently until ready to serve.  Finished.
